Reference

All functions

aggregate_pheno()

Temporally aggregate time series values

assign_season()

Filter phenological cycles

cut_cycles()

Cut cycles

extract_pheno()

Extract phenological metrics

extract_s2ts()

Extract time series from sen2r archives

fakeFit()

Covert a zoo into a {phenopix} format

fill_s2ts()

Fill not equally-spaced time series

fit_curve()

Fit curve over cycles

plot(<s2ts>)

Plot s2ts object

read_s2cube()

Read raster cubes from sen2r archives

s2_dop_simpl()

Simplified sen2r::s2_dop() for internal usage

s2ts() as.s2ts()

Class s2ts

scl_weights()

Build SCL weights

smooth_s2ts()

Filter and smooth time series from sen2r archives

st_warp_fixing()

Extract phenological metrics

w_savgol()

Savitzky-Golay filter for not equally-spaced weighted data
